name: Grameena Vikas Kendram Society for Rural Development

address: YSR Colony, Near C.P Brown Library,

briefDescription: Established in 1990, Grameena Vikas Kendram Society for Rural Development (GVK Society) is one of the actively working grass root level volunteer organizations, recognized for expertise in ecological management and institutional interventions for uplifting living standards of rural communities in south India. It is a non-governmental, non-political organization, registered as a society bearing registration number: 207/1990 under the societies act XX1 of 1860 in India and Foreign Contribution Act (FCRA) with registration number: 010120180. Organization is based in Kadapa District and operating in multiple locations in Andhra Pradesh, Telangana and Tamil Nadu states.
